complaint.description: Pathetic thieves. Rain's customer care is utterly pathetic. I canceled my prescription at the end of Jan for the end of Feb as we IMMIGRATED to another country. I got a email confirmation and a reference number that it will be canceled but still the money went off my account. I am not able to get calls only emails and I can't make calls to them as I don't live in SA anymore. How the hell is that possible?????? I really liked rain with the cancel 'any time' but you don't do your part???? I will never advise anyone to use RAIN. Absolutely useless.
complaint.suggestion: Improve customer service and ensure that cancellations are properly processed.
